text: Rafael Nadal was the five-time defending champion, but withdrew from the tournament due to fatigue. Fernando Verdasco defeated Robin Söderling in the final to claim his first Barcelona Open title. ==Seeds== The top eight seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom Half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Sing
title: 2010 Barcelona Open Banco Sabadell – Singles
